/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with trees on both sides, their leaves a vibrant green against the backdrop of the clear blue sky. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades bathed in sunlight. On the right side of the street, a blue sign stands out, bearing the inscription "Beijing". The sun shines brightly in the background, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. The image is a beautiful representation of a day in the life of this bustling city.
